00020 #ifndef __surfit_oper__
00021 #define __surfit_oper__
00022 
00023 #include "matlab.h"
00024 
00025 namespace surfit {
00026 
00027 class vec;
00028 
00032 class SURFIT_EXPORT oper : public matlabSparseMatrix {
00033 public:
00035         virtual ~oper() {};
00036 
00042         virtual REAL operator()(int i, int j, int * next_j = NULL) const = 0;
00043 
00049         virtual REAL at(int i, int j, int * next_j = NULL) const = 0;
00050 
00052         virtual long cols() const = 0;
00053 
00055         virtual long rows() const = 0;
00056         
00062         virtual REAL mult_line(int J, const REAL * b_begin, const REAL * b_end) const = 0;
00063 
00069         virtual REAL mult_transposed_line(int J, const REAL * b_begin, const REAL * b_end) const = 0;
00070         
00072         void mult(vec * b, vec * r);
00073 
00075         void mult_transposed(vec * b, vec * r);
00076 
00078         virtual REAL norm() const = 0;
00079 };
00080 
00084 class SURFIT_EXPORT oper_complex : public oper {
00085 public:
00086         
00093         oper_complex(REAL iw1, oper *iT1, REAL iw2 = 0, oper *iT2 = NULL);
00094 
00096         virtual ~oper_complex();
00097 
00098         virtual REAL operator()(int i, int j, int * next_j = NULL) const;
00099         virtual REAL at(int i, int j, int * next_j = NULL) const;
00100     
00101         virtual REAL mult_line(int J, const REAL * b_begin, const REAL * b_end) const;
00102         virtual REAL mult_transposed_line(int J, const REAL * b_begin, const REAL * b_end) const;
00103             
00104         virtual REAL norm() const;
00105         
00106         virtual long cols() const;
00107         
00108         virtual long rows() const;
00109 
00111         REAL w1;
00113         oper * T1;
00115         REAL w2;
00117         oper * T2;
00118     
00119 };
00120 
00121 }; // namespace surfit;
00122 
00123 #endif
